title: 2020 Elections, Impeachment Probe & Trade
itunes:title: 2020 Elections, Impeachment Probe & Trade
description:
Kevin spoke with Kristen Hawn, Democratic Strategist, Senior Advisor at Rokk Solutions and Fmr. Blue Dog Coalition Communications Director, and Scott Tranter, CEO of 0ptimus and former Data Science Director for Marco Rubio for President.

They discussed trade, 2020 elections, Bill Gates' comments on Democratic Senator Elizabeth Warren about her proposals to tax the super wealthy, and Senate Judiciary Chair Lindsey Graham comments on the impeachment probe.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
